Field.Label: Preset Memories:
Enter how many Preset memories you'd like Hue Lights to keep saved (a number from 1 to 100). See warning below.

WARNING: Lowering the Preset Memories number will cause the highest Preset memory spaces to be permanently deleted. All actions that reference deleted Presets will result in Indigo errors when attempting to recall those Presets. Don't lower the number unless you're sure nothing uses the Presets that will be deleted.

1. Select a "Hue Bridge Number". Start with number 0.
2. Select Action. Either "Add or Edit" or "Delete".
4.a. If Adding or Editing a Bridge, enter the IP address assigned to the Hue Bridge by your router. You'll need to use your router's administrative interface to find this. Go to step 5.
4.b. If Deleting, clicking the "Conform" button has removed your Hue Bridge settings. Go to step 6.
5. Go to the Hue Bridge and press the center button. Within 30 seconds, come back to this dialog and click the "Pair Now" button.
